WorkItem.Description:
Items with Class Restriction: Deathknight do not show up in the TankDK Module. The Module exports TargetClass = Character.CharacterClass.DeathKnight instead of Paladin as the DPSDK Module.
Â 
Not all DK Weapon Enchants are parsed (Swordshattering, etc).

Comments.Message:
v2.1.4:

DPSDK module loaded but no DK T7 gear available... I think it's Paladin gear.  Also under options for fight parameters, Level 73 is chosen along with a base armor that is too low.  This also may be the reason Expertise has 0 weight under item budget.  (You may also want to consider "armor" under the DPS budget, if you have the Tier1 Blood Talent.  Armor ---> AP... including the armor received from AGI.)

[quote]DPSDK module loaded but no DK T7 gear available... I think it's Paladin gear. Also under options for fight parameters, Level 73 is chosen along with a base armor that is too low. This also may be the reason Expertise has 0 weight under item budget. (You may also want to consider "armor" under the DPS budget, if you have the Tier1 Blood Talent. Armor ---> AP... including the armor received from AGI.)[/quote]

/bump?
As covered all over, many times, including the readme, 2.1.4 included no DK changes. DK changes are coming in a later version.
